import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import GitHubCalendar from 'react-github-calendar'; import { Form, Grid, Image, Transition } from 'semantic-ui-react' const transitions = [ 'browse', 'browse right', 'drop', 'fade', 'fade up', 'fade down', 'fade left', 'fade right', 'fly up', 'fly down', 'fly left', 'fly right', 'horizontal flip', 'vertical flip', 'scale', 'slide up', 'slide down', 'slide left', 'slide right', 'swing up', 'swing down', 'swing left', 'swing right', 'zoom', ] const options = transitions.map((name) => ({ key: name, text: name, value: name, })) export default class About extends React.Component{ render(){ return(
{/* container for about header, description and img. 2 colums */}

about me

Full-stack web developer with a passion for problem-solving. With experience in Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, and React I discovered web development while taking computer science classes and I fell in love with it. I bring strong skills in working with people, communication in English and Spanish as well as managing people. I spend my free time playing guitar as well as building small projects and learning about new technologies.
